headline: From Krypton to Convention: Old Spice and DC Make a "Fresh Landing" at San Diego Comic-Con
summary: CINCINNATI, July 24, 2025--Old Spice, the champion of legendary freshness, is suiting up alongside DC’s Superman™ to bring a scentsational experience to San Diego Comic-Con (7/24 - 7/27). Inspired by Old Spice's latest intergalactic advertising spot "Smell Super," where the NEW Old Spice x Superman Collection crash-lands on Earth and shows a regular teenager how he can be a stronger, manlier version of himself, the all-new interactive experience will give convention-goers a blast of 24/7 freshne

headline: Zefiro Subsidiary P&G Secures Award for Well-Plugging Project Near Columbus, Ohio
summary: In recent months, Zefiro subsidiary Plants & Goodwin, Inc. (“P&G”) has continued to win awards for state-funded work in Ohio having recently announced a USD $420,784 project in Belmont County, in addition to a USD $19.6 million Construction Manager at Risk contract from the Ohio Department of Natural Resources (“ODNR”) announced on June 18, 2025. Today, Zefiro announced that P&G was recently awarded another ODNR service contract with a winning bid of USD $522,233 for remediating a group of wells

summary: The U.S. hand sanitizer market presents opportunities in high-traffic urban and underserved rural areas driven by heightened post-pandemic hygiene awareness.
